column1: FC Znamya Noginsk (Russian: «Знамя» (Ногинск)) is a Russian football team from Noginsk. It played professionally in 1949
column3: 1994–2002 and from 2020. Their best result was 2nd place in the zone 2 of the second-highest Soviet First League in 1959 (they played on that level in 1949 and 1958–1962). For the 2020–21 season
column4: it re-entered the third-tier Russian Professional Football League.

column1: Note: Flags indicate national team as defined under FIFA eligibility rules. Players may hold more than one non-FIFA nationality.
